ace_sentences: My name is Pedro.
I am 14 years old.
I write this comment for a school project.
I share my opinion.
I do not notice many surprising things.
My mother wants to move to Florida.
I cannot move to Florida now.
I cannot move to Florida partly because of past memories.
I need to stay with my grandparents.
In the future, my grandparents will be gone.
After that, I will go to Florida.
I want to be with my father figure in Florida.
The distance between me and my mother is about 3000 miles.
Because of this distance, I cannot call my mother all the time.
Because of this distance, I cannot visit my mother all the time.
This situation relates to my community.
This situation may be a reason for depression.
Parents are a huge part of life.
A person should call the parents every day.
A person should say to the parents that the person loves the parents.
Life is fast.
The headline is: The parental extinction is among us.
The parental extinction starts with cutting communication.
